name: ZyWay
tag_list: mobile-data-collection, mobile-forms, digital-forms, web-forms, form-analytics, secure-forms
overview:
ZyWay is a universal electronic forms solution provider that focuses on mobile data collection, aimed for the enterprise.

ZyWay provides a basic form builder that covers all popular form elements and various form distribution ways, including mobile. There are various security features such as secret and private forms or user permissions that can make mobile data collection very precise, safe and cost effective for companies that collect field data.

The product is currently (November 2012) in a early Beta, open to all users, with plans to launch as a stable product in March 2013.
